E-polling,
    Election reimagined with blockchain.

    Election done right with tamper-proof, transparent and cost-effective technology.

    Who Are We?

    We firmly believe that blockchain is the key to the next advancement in election systems

    Just like Steve Jobs believed in the Internet, we believed in the rising technology that is Blockchain. As the authors of the book [Blockchain and the Law] stated, "A general-purpose tool for creating secure, decentralized, peer-to-peer applications, blockchain technology has been compared to the Internet itself in both form and impact."

    Our Mission

    To make election fair and square with the right technology.

    Our Values

    Unified and tamper-proof system for greater transparency in democracy.
